attributes.description:
Eye catching is this 2012 BMW 1 Series 125i Convertible Auto, this 125i has no problem turning heads and the interior is as luxurious as you would expect from BMW. It comes with power steering, multi-functioning steering, electric windows, air conditioning, radio/CD player leather seats and central locking remote. For this and more exciting specials on offers please feel free to visit a CCS dealership near you or alternatively you can download an application form for finance of the back of our website for your convenience. Your loyalty and support as our current and future client is highly appreciated. Giving you excellent service is always a pleasure. Our price excludes additional costs such as license, registration and COR. The mechanical warranty is optional.
The vehicle is being reduced from 229 995 to 219 995.
#10237
